column4: i'm trying to launch gui apps remotely from an ssh tunnel ... server is lubuntu client is ubuntu... does anyone know what i need to do to allow remotely launching gui apps from lubuntu?
dennis, i've never done it before ...
the command that i used "ssh -C -X user@my.se.rv.er gnome-terminal"
sometimes it takes a long time to get the gui on the client, especially over the internet
It appears to be not working (with no errors) but if you give it like 2 minutes it will work
